title: Edit a Reservation record
content:
You can edit a reservation record to add new information or change existing information. To edit a reservation record, perform the following steps:

  1. From the main menu, select Build > Service Asset & Configuration.

  2. From SACM Home, select Reservations.

  3. Select the reservation record you want to edit or view.

    To filter the record list, click the Add filter  button. For more information, see Filters.

  4. Click the record identifier in the ID column to display the selected record.

  5. By default, the reservation record is displayed with the General tab selected. Click the tab you want to edit or view:

    new reservation
    Field Description
    General Displays detailed information about the SACM component. The General tab section displays the same items as New Reservation dialog box.
    Workflow Displays the workflow metaphase and phase for the current record. For more information about workflows, see Reservations workflow.
    Discussions Displays any relevant conversations about the current record. For more information about discussions, see Discussions.
    History Displays changes to the selected record. For more information about history, see History.

  6. Click   Save on the toolbar.
